summary: I don’t really wanna design my V’s face yet bc I want my OC’s to resemble at least a little what the look like in a game and...
caption:
I don’t really wanna design my V’s face yet bc I want my OC’s to resemble at least a little what the look like in a game and since, y’know, the game isn’t even out yet–

anyway, obv that won’t stop me from drawing outfits instead

reblog.comment:
I don’t really wanna design my V’s face yet bc I want my OC’s to resemble at least a little what the look like in a game and since, y’know, the game isn’t even out yet–

anyway, obv that won’t stop me from drawing outfits instead

blog.name: gabriel-strange

blog.description: 24, just a regular straight chilean geeky guy who likes comics, movies, video games, mlp, wild cards and do drawings and animations. also i love brony bacon , the brony community will understand what do i mean ;). and i reaaaaaally have a soft spot for martial arts comics; besides being an animation student, im an aspiring screenwriter, anti-sjw to the bone. summary: Cyberpunk 2077 in 48 minuti di gioco - L'analisi, parte 3
title: Cyberpunk 2077 in 48 minuti di gioco - L'analisi, parte 3
body:
#cyberpunk2077 #recap #ilvdgpost @CDPROJEKTRED Cyberpunk 2077 in 48 minuti di gioco - L'analisi, parte 3

Nella seconda parte dell’approfondimento della demo di Cyberpunk 2077 avevamo concluso l’analisi minuto per minuto degli spezzoni di gioco. Concentriamoci ora su aspetti meno palesi, ma ugualmente importanti per i fan, partendo dalla lore.

Il futuro dispotico in cui si svolgono le vicende di Cyberpunk 2077 ricalcherà quello…

View On WordPress

summary: Cyberpunk 2077 - Новый скриншот мужской версии протагониста
title: Cyberpunk 2077 - Новый скриншот мужской версии протагониста
body: Cтудия CD Projekt RED продолжает подогревать интерес к своей предстоящей RPG Cyberpunk 2077. Сегодня разработчики опубликовали новый скриншот проекта, изображающий мужскую версию персонажа “V” во время перестрелки с погоней на одной из улиц дневного … Читать дальше »

summary: Cyberpunk 2077 : jeu dans un univers futuriste
title: Cyberpunk 2077 : jeu dans un univers futuriste
body: Le jeu très attendu Cyberpunk 2077 est développé par le même studio qui a fait le titre populaire The Witcher ; CD Projekt. L’histoire se déroulera dans un futur dystopique où malgré que vous ne soyez pas né héros, vous pouvez en devenir un.

blog.name: jackass-insomniac
blog.title: Probably Being an Asshole
blog.description: As said by my family, I'll probably die out of spite.

summary: I'm usually excited for one or two games a year.
body:
I’m usually excited for one or two games a year.

Like, all year. Before, during and after E3 announcements and individual announcements. Only one or two.

This year, I’m excited for Cyberpunk 2077, Sypro Remaster, One’s Justice, FFVII Remake, KH3, Death Stranding, Assassin’s Creed Odyssy, and Athem.

Games announced this year are really amazing. I actually told someone that knows jackshit about video games to keep and eye out for tv commercials ‘cause I don’t watch tv and I really wanna know if more info is out.

Proud of games this year.
